verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] often undercut his national security team , and on at least one occasion , they joked about it .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [ARGM-TMP: often] [V: undercut] [ARG1: his national security team] , and on at least one occasion , they joked about it .
President Donald Trump has often undercut his national security team , and [ARGM-TMP: on at least one occasion] , [ARG0: they] [V: joked] [ARG1: about it] .
